title: Christian reacts to 9 Shocking Facts of the Quran (will I finally revert to Islam?)
description: Reading The Quran, as a Christian, I was amazed by the Text itself. However, I am not an Arabic Speaker and therefore I am not able to appreciate the full Beauty of the Quran in it's original Arabic State. Moreover, I do not know about the explanations of certain passages withing the Quran that can be interpreted as Predictions.
